name: Bankjoy
headline: An end-to-end digital banking solution for banks and credit unions
description: Bankjoy provides a full suite of modern digital banking software, including mobile banking, online banking, online account opening, loan applications, and conversational AI to banks and credit unions.

founders.name: Mike Duncan, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Mike Duncan is the founder and CEO of Bankjoy, a Detroit-based digital banking startup.  Before starting Bankjoy, Mike developed banking software for a Michigan-based credit union.  He also developed payments and financial software for Unisys and the Detroit Tigers.  Mike studied computer science at Kettering University in Flint, MI.

# The best digital banking experience from end to end.
Built for banks and credit unions, Bankjoy delivers a seamless digital banking solution including mobile and online banking, online account opening, online loan applications, statements and Conversational AI
[Schedule a demo](http://bankjoy.com/</contact/>)
![bankjoy hero](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/0a2403fc-4ccb-4d7d-b934-71c7f887fc2b_Bankjoy_hero.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1443&h=2106)
[Schedule a demo](http://bankjoy.com/</contact/>)
[![](https://bankjoyweb.cdn.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/85c71091-4875-40f3-bce6-83491c2f5889_yc_logo.svg?fit=max&w=300&h=65)](http://bankjoy.com/<https:/blog.ycombinator.com/bankjoy-yc-w15-is-building-a-modern-day-mobile-banking-app-for-use-by-credit-unions-and-smaller-banks/>)
[![](https://bankjoyweb.cdn.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/69404a46-1745-40da-85ad-e787eb68b322_america_banker_logo.svg?fit=max&w=300&h=70)](http://bankjoy.com/<https:/www.americanbanker.com/creditunions/news/new-online-banking-system-reaps-dividends-for-safeamerica-cu>)
[![](https://bankjoyweb.cdn.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/c3bf3052-0d26-4859-8b62-aec6945c3def_TC_logo.svg?fit=max&w=300&h=45)](http://bankjoy.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2015/03/16/bankjoy-is-building-a-modern-day-mobile-banking-app-for-use-by-credit-unions-and-smaller-banks/>)
[![](https://bankjoyweb.cdn.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/3c358120-cfb9-4601-b588-a48d8692ebdf_CreditUnionTimes.svg?fit=max&w=300&h=30)](http://bankjoy.com/<https:/www.cutimes.com/2016/09/11/duncan-kicks-credit-union-technology-up-a-notch/>)
# Everything you need out of the box
##### 01
##### Retail Banking
A seamlessly integrated digital banking suite for today’s modern consumer
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/</solution/retail-banking/>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/f8d3f9aa-6f3b-4d18-8d53-0c8841a39259_home_retail-banking.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1596&h=1001)
##### 02
##### Business Banking
A digital banking solution designed for small and medium sized businesses
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/<https:/pages.bankjoy.com/business-banking>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/f95a8ff8-2d95-4230-afe0-ecef33d7dbc3_business-banking.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1627&h=1091)
##### 03
##### Online Loan Applications
Elegant and fast online and mobile loan processing creates a lasting user experience
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/</solution/online-loan-application/>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/641e80de-3754-4d0c-8538-c6adc0ad9d79_home_ola.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1616&h=1106)
##### 04
##### Online Account Opening
Elegant and fast online and mobile account opening sets the stage for fast onboarding and happy users
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/<https:/pages.bankjoy.com/online-account-opening-2.0>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/c2a76b86-ccef-454b-a60c-c72d01ffe32c_home_oao.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1348&h=1022)
##### 05
##### Conversational AI and Phone Banking
Help consumers achieve their financial goals even easier with “Joy,” our conversational chatbot
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/</solution/conversational-ai/>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/68b99d0b-01d4-454e-9af0-c4fa4ce71382_Bankjoy_conversational_ai.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=2458&h=2349)
##### 06
##### Statements
Statements offers the consistent look and feel of Bankjoy’s digital banking while providing timely account information across any channel
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/</solution/statements/>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/832a569f-c209-4468-b2f1-e61039d0bf96_statements.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1579&h=1179)
##### 07
##### Security
Bankjoy mitigates security concerns by providing a trusted platform that minimizes security-induced friction
[Learn More](http://bankjoy.com/</solution/security/>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/dc80dac3-2fa6-44aa-a31f-a70c8f50170a_home_security.png?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=1383&h=963)

Deliver amazing UX via multiple channels – all seamlessly integrated.
![](https://bankjoyweb.cdn.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/cf9f208b-305d-43da-a72c-e77fe966d94d_PILS.svg?fit=max&w=36&h=36)
##### Proven industry-leading service
Ask our customers. Quality service is in our DNA.
![](https://bankjoyweb.cdn.prismic.io/bankjoyweb/f3b5bd50-286b-462a-9384-eacef7bbaeb2_DBUG.svg?fit=max&w=36&h=36)
##### Digital banking user growth
Achieve award-winning growth after switching to Bankjoy.

generated_description:
**Bankjoy: A Modern Digital Banking Solution**

Founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator's W15 batch, **Bankjoy** sets out to revolutionize the digital banking experience, specifically for banks and credit unions. Based in Troy, Michigan, this growing company—currently employing around 60 people—provides an end-to-end digital banking platform that seamlessly integrates mobile and online banking, account opening, loan applications, and even conversational AI.

**What Do They Offer?**

Bankjoy isn’t just about making banking easier; it’s about creating a comprehensive suite of tools. Here’s what you can find:

1. **Retail Banking**: A digital banking suite tailored for the modern consumer.
2. **Business Banking**: Solutions designed for small to medium-sized businesses.
3. **Online Loan Applications**: Streamlined and user-friendly, enhancing the loan experience.
4. **Online Account Opening**: Fast and elegant onboarding processes.
5. **Conversational AI**: "Joy," their chatbot, helps users navigate their financial needs more seamlessly.
6. **Account Statements**: Consistent and timely updates available across all platforms.
7. **Robust Security**: Prioritizing a secure banking environment for users.

**Why Bankjoy?**

The company prides itself on its vision and commitment to enhancing the banking landscape. With over **63 clients** and **1,000,000+ members served**, they highlight a strong track record of growth and satisfaction, achieving a stellar **4.8 rating** on their app. Their mantra revolves around user experience, integration across multiple channels, and offering high-quality customer service.

If you’re curious about innovation in banking or looking for solutions that empower your financial institution, Bankjoy is a name to watch. You can check out more at [bankjoy.com](http://bankjoy.com).
